div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1616 Ascalon, Judaea, 1927 Burial: after 62 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: c. 24 AR Antiochus VII: 2 tetradr. (Tyre, yrs. 174, 182) Ascalon: 6 tetradr. (dated 31-41) Disposition: unknown Information from E.S.G. Robinson For the Ascalon era see Brett, AJA 1937, pp. 452 ff.
